name: Gun Shooter: Flip & Boom
description:
ULTRA FUN AND CHALLENGING GAME!

Fun and arcade style game, where you can try yourself in shooting moving targets. Shoot wisely with AWP snipers rifles,pistols,mini gun or make fantastic burts with automatic weapons or blow it up with bazooka! 
— 14 cool futuristic weapons
— unique one finger gameplay mechanics
— shoot using powerful firearms

Unlock and try all amazing weapons and reach the worldwide high score!
